name: p!atd- rosevest/ryden love -- tumblr dash edit
description: A Rose Vest inspired Ryden theme for the tumblr dash.
additional_info: february 28, 2012: tumblr added new "new post" buttons to the default dash, so i'm working on editing the "new post" bar on my edit to work better with the new buttons. in the meantime, i'm going to replace my edited bar with a temporary one!! if you have any questions please contact me via my ask box on tumblr, andrewvolpe.tumblr.com/ask
